threats.title: AE01 DDoS Attack To Cloud Application
threats.description:
DDoS/DoS attack against cloud application from the Internet;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application
threats.description:
EDoS (Economic Denial of Sustainability or Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: AE03 Network Attacks To Cloud Application
threats.description:
Remote side can perform remote malicious activities based on misconfiguration or vulnerabilities of the cloud application;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: AE04 Cloud Application Abuse
threats.description:
Malicious usage (abuse) of cloud application from the Internet (e.g. sending spam, participating botnet, mining) after gain control on it;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application
threats.description:
Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface
threats.description:
Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application;
reason: поток1;

threats.title: BA01 Malicious Insider In Cloud Infrastructure
threats.description:
Malicious insider in cloud infrastructure causes security issues of cloud application;

threats.title: BA02 Lack Of Reserved Resources For Cloud Application
threats.description:
Lack of reserved resources for cloud application because of overload of cloud infrastructure;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA03 Failure Of Resource Scaling For Cloud Application
threats.description:
Unexpected failure of resource scaling for cloud application;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA04 Hidden Dependencies Of Cloud Infrastructure
threats.description:
Hidden dependencies between components of cloud application and cloud infrastructure cause security issues of cloud application;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA05 Lack Of Resource Isolation Of Cloud Application
threats.description:

reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA06 Loss Of Security Control
threats.description:
Loss of visibility and control of security and privacy of cloud application (partially controlled);
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA07 Poor Information Security Processes
threats.description:
Poor information security processes of cloud provider (design, implementation and operations);
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA08 Audit And Certification Issues
threats.description:
Audit and certification of cloud applications and infrastructure are inaccessible or restricted;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA09 Security Issues Of SLA
threats.description:
Incorrect or unclear information security section of SLA;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA10 Service Provider Lock-In
threats.description:
Service provider lock-in;

threats.title: BA11 Software License Issues
threats.description:
Software license issues;
reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA12 Confiscation Of Computer Hardware
threats.description:

reason: поток10;

threats.title: BA13 Restrictions Of Forensic Readiness
threats.description:

threats.title: BA14 Physical Access Or Theft Of Computer Equipment

Unauthorized access or theft of computer equipment from data centre;
